processors.name: advanced-speech-by-text
processors.extended_description:
Get advanced human audio file by provided text and language. Tool generates audios with 500 characters at least. If you want to get a right result, text must be written in selected language.

Supported languages: Arabic, American, Bengali (India), British, Czech (female), Danish, Dutch, Finnish (female), French, German, Greek (female), Gujurati (India), Hindi (India), Hungarian (female), Indonesian, Japanese, Kanada (India), Korean, Malayalam (India), Mandarin, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Slovak (female), Spanish (female), Tamil (India), Telugu (India), Turkish, Ukranian (female), Vietnamese.

params.name: text
params.ok_sample: Hi! My name is Miquel. I will read any text you type here.

processors.name: speech-by-text
processors.extended_description:
Get audio file by provided text and language. Tool generates audios with 500 characters at least. If you want to get a result, text must be written in selected language.

Supported languages: Spanish (es-ES), American (en-US), German (de-DE), French (fr-FR), Italian (it-IT), Japanese (jp-JP), Portuguese (pt-PT), Russian (ru-RU).

params.name: text
params.ok_sample: Hi! My name is Miquel. I will read any text you type here.

processors.name: invitation
processors.extended_description:
Send a custom message invitation to a non connected Linkedin profile (supported uris: https://www.linkedin.com/in/USERID). You can customize your message with contact firstname with {{first}}.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account.

A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and your li_at cookie value.

params.name: message
params.ok_sample: Hi {{first}}, would you like to be part of my network! Thanks

processors.name: invitation-or-message
processors.description: Invitation or message to Linkedin profile
processors.description_en: Invitation or message to Linkedin profile
processors.extended_description:
Send a custom invitation message if profile is connecte or a custom message otherwise (supported uris: https://www.linkedin.com/in/USERID). You can customize your message with contact firstname with {{first}}.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account.

A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and your li_at cookie value.

params.name: message
params.ok_sample: Hi {{first}}, would you like to be part of my network? Thanks

processors.cleaned_description: invitation or message to linkedin profile

processors.name: message
processors.extended_description:
Send a custom private message to a connected Linkedin profile (supported uris: https://www.linkedin.com/in/USERID). You can customize your message with contact firstname with {{first}}. Only first degree connections can receive messages. It doesn't work if InMail feature is enabled on profile.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account.

A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and your li_at cookie value.

params.name: message
params.ok_sample: Hi {{first}}, would you like to be part of my network? Thanks

processors.name: by-addresses
processors.extended_description: Returns straight-line distance in kilometers between two addresses

processors.name: by-addresses
processors.extended_description: Returns driving routing time, distance, fuel consumption and cost between two addresses. Fast route is applied and toll costs are not considered. Fuel consumption was fixed to 5 liters/kilometer and 1.2€ per liter

processors.name: by-coordinates
processors.extended_description: Returns straight-line distance in kilometers between two GPS coordinates (latitude and longitude)

processors.name: by-coordinates
processors.extended_description: Returns driving routing time, distance, fuel consumption and cost between two GPS coordinates (latitude and longitude). Fast route is applied and toll costs are not considered. Fuel consumption was fixed to 5 liters/kilometer and 1.2€ per liter

processors.name: by-ip
processors.extended_description: Discover latitude and longitude coordinates of an IP address

processors.name: by-ips
processors.extended_description: Returns straight-line distance in kilometers between two IP addresses

processors.name: by-ips
processors.extended_description: Returns driving routing time, distance, fuel consumption and cost between two IP addresses. Fast route is applied and toll costs are not considered. Fuel consumption was fixed to 5 liters/kilometer and 1.2€ per liter

processors.name: by-phones
processors.extended_description: Returns straight-line distance in kilometers between two landline phones, using city and province of every phone

processors.name: by-phones
processors.extended_description: Returns driving routing time, distance, fuel consumption and cost between two landline phones, using city and province of every phone (only Spain). Fast route is applied and toll costs are not considered. Fuel consumption was fixed to 5 liters/kilometer and 1.2€ per liter

processors.name: by-zipcodes
processors.extended_description: Returns straight-line distance in kilometers between two zipcodes, using city and province of every zipcode

processors.name: by-zipcodes
processors.extended_description: Returns driving routing time, distance, fuel consumption and cost between two zipcodes, using city and province of every zipcode. Fast route is applied and toll costs are not considered. Fuel consumption was fixed to 5 liters/kilometer and 1.2€ per liter

processors.name: converted-between-isocode-date
processors.extended_description:
Convert amount between supported currencies and an exchange date. EURO exchange rate is applied to all conversions. If no exchange date is provided, last available date is assigned.

Supported currencies: AUD, BGN, BRL, CAD, CHF, CNY, CZK, DKK, GBP, HKD, HRK, HUF, IDR, ILS, INR, ISK, JPY, KRW, MXN, MYR, NOK, NZD, PHP, PLN, RON, RUB, SEK, SGD, THB, TRY, USD, ZAR

processors.name: list-by-ip
processors.extended_description: Get all ISO currency codes by an IP address

processors.name: list-by-isocode
processors.extended_description: Get multiple ISO currency codes by a country ISO code

processors.name: valid-iso
processors.extended_description: Discover if an ISO currency code is valid

processors.name: betw
processors.extended_description: Discover if a date (date1) is betwen two dates (date2, date3)

processors.name: difference
processors.extended_description:
Returns difference between two dates (start and end) in seconds, minutes, hours or days
By default, difference is returned in seconds.

processors.name: eq
processors.extended_description: Discover if two dates are equal

processors.name: ge
processors.extended_description: Discover if a date is greater or equal

processors.name: gt
processors.extended_description: Discover if a date is greater

processors.name: le
processors.extended_description: Discover if a date is lower or equal

processors.name: leap
processors.extended_description: Discover if a date belongs to a leap year

processors.name: lt
processors.extended_description: Discover if a date is lower

processors.name: normalized
processors.extended_description: Allow to normalize a date, removing non allowed characters

processors.name: parsed
processors.extended_description: Parse datetime, without format dependency, into multiple fields

processors.name: custom
processors.extended_description:
Send a custom email (HTML supported) to a recipient. Email recipient is verified before sending email, to avoid bounces. Only emails marked with catchall, disposable or deliverable status will be sent.

If you want to send an email with your own custom domain, add a new application 'Email' from Integration section or talk with our support team.

params.name: body
params.ok_sample:
Hi!

Welcome to uProc and start improving your business processes!

processors.name: disposable
processors.extended_description: Check if email domain belongs to a disposable email service

processors.name: domain
processors.extended_description: Allow to get domain from an email

processors.name: exists
processors.extended_description:
Discover if the email recipient exists, returning email status. Tool returns next responses:
  • invalid-format : Email has an invalid format.
  • invalid-domain : Email domain cannot receive emails.
  • timeout : The email server has returned no response about email. The server may be down, but the email could exist.
  • catchall : Email server does not return a reliable response about the existence of the recipient. Email must be discarded in campaigns.
  • spamtrap : These are emails whose senders were marked as spam in a shipment. It is recommended not to use them in campaigns.
  • softbounce : This is an email that exists but has an account blocked or does not have enough space to receive more emails.
  • disposable : The email belongs to a temporary domain. Emails from these domains will bounce after some time.
  • unknown, unknown-error : An error has occurred on the destination server when requesting more information about the email. They are emails that can be included in campaigns.
  • undeliverable : Email does not exist on the server. They are emails to be discarded in campaigns.
  • deliverable : The email exists on the server. They are the valid emails for the campaigns.
>

If you want to know all email properties, use check-email-exists-extended.

Usual bounce ratio after cleaning is lower than 3%, but it depends on your email domain list.

processors.name: exists-extended
processors.extended_description:
Discover if an email is valid, hardbounce, softbounce, spamtrap, free, temporary and recipient exists.

There are catchall (like Yahoo) or temporary domains that do not return the actual existence of an email. For those cases, and for certain blocked system accounts, you can receive bounced mails.

Usual bounce ratio after cleaning is lower than 3%, but it depends on your email domain list

properties.name: error
properties.description: If there is an error related with format, domain not valid or server not avaiable, 'true' value will appear

properties.name: catchall
properties.description: If domains accepts all emails, contains 'true'

properties.name: type
properties.description: Returns if email is generic or personal

properties.name: isp
properties.description: It contains domain isp name, grouping by Gmail, Hotmail, Yahoo and Others

properties.name: exist
properties.description: If receiver exists, contains 'true'. Softbounce will be considered as an existing recipient

properties.name: hardbounce
properties.description: If recipient doesn't exist, 'true' value will appear. Any email sent to the address will be returned to emissor

properties.name: youmean
properties.description: It shows an alternative email (fixing jotmail, gmial and other text errors) if checked domain doesn't have an MX record

properties.name: response
properties.description:
It shows the error reason. Possible returned values:
  • invalid-format : Email has an invalid format.
  • invalid-domain : Email domain cannot receive emails.
  • timeout : The email server has returned no response about email. The server may be down, but the email could exist.
  • catchall : Email server does not return a reliable response about the existence of the recipient. Email must be discarded in campaigns.
  • spamtrap : These are emails whose senders were marked as spam in a shipment. It is recommended not to use them in campaigns.
  • softbounce : This is an email that exists but has an account blocked or does not have enough space to receive more emails.
  • disposable : The email belongs to a temporary domain. Emails from these domains will bounce after some time.
  • unknown, unknown-error : An error has occurred on the destination server when requesting more information about the email. They are emails that can be included in campaigns.
  • undeliverable : Email does not exist on the server. They are emails to be discarded in campaigns.
  • deliverable : The email exists on the server. They are the valid emails for the campaigns.

properties.name: softbounce
properties.description: If recipient exists, but can't receive emails due to differente reasons (acount blocked, full account, ...), 'true' value will appear

properties.name: spamtrap
properties.description: If recipient belongs to a restricted account for administrative uses in domain, this can affect your email delivery and IP reputation and 'true' value will appear

properties.name: free
properties.description: If email domain is a free email service (Hotmail, Gmail, Yahoo, ...), 'true' value will appear

properties.name: disposable
properties.description: If email domain is a temporary email domain service, 'true' value will appear

properties.name: role
properties.description: If email is a system or generic account, 'true' value will appear

properties.name: robinson
properties.description: If recipient exist in Robinson list (only Spain), 'true' value will appear

properties.name: alias
properties.description: If email recipient is an alias, 'true' value will appear

processors.name: gdpr-list-by-domain
processors.extended_description: Get GDPR compliant emails list by domain for your Email Marketing campaigns in Europe.

processors.name: list-by-domain
processors.extended_description:
Get emails list found on internet by domain or URI (similar to hunter.io). Useful to locate emails for your email marketing campaigns in a moment.

If lots of emails are found on Internet, you can paginate them with the page parameter. Every page returns up to 10 emails.

processors.name: list-by-email
processors.extended_description:
Get emails list found on internet by non-free email (similar to hunter.io). Useful to locate emails of the same domain for your email marketing campaigns in a moment. It doesn't work with free emails.

If lots of emails are found on Internet, you can paginate them with the page parameter. Every page returns up to 10 emails.

processors.name: list-in-site
processors.extended_description:
Get emails list found inside website by domain or URI (similar to hunter.io).

Useful to locate emails for your email marketing campaigns in a moment.

If website contains lots of emails, you can paginate them with the page parameter. Every page returns up to 10 emails.

processors.name: recipient
processors.description: Email by name, surname and domain
processors.description_en: Email by name, surname and domain
processors.extended_description:
Discover an email by company website or domain and prospect's firstname and lastname.

Tools checks multiple email variants in real-time, and returns a result depending on email server response.

You can use Dux-Soup and FindThatLead with uProc for Sheets or the Wizard to get professional email of your leads!

properties.name: confidence
properties.description: Contains result confidence where 'verified' is for reliable emails and 'risky' for aproximated emails

properties.name: score
properties.description: Contains result scoring, where 0 is not reliable and 99 very reliable

processors.name: recipient-gdpr
processors.description: Public email by name, surname and domain (GDPR)
processors.description_en: Public email by name, surname and domain (GDPR)
processors.extended_description:
Discover an email by company website or domain and prospect's firstname and lastname.

The tool only uses publicly available emails found on the internet and matches the recipient by first name and last name (GDPR compliant). A web reference is returned for legal purposes. The returned email is not verified.

You can use Dux-Soup and FindThatLead with uProc for Sheets or the Wizard to get professional email of your leads!

processors.name: blacklists
processors.extended_description: Get all blacklists where an IP address appears

processors.name: connections
processors.extended_description:
Extract last 80 connections from your LinkedIn profile. You can setup the list where you want to save them (default: last-connections). The system automatically creates the list.

Extraction mode affects the speed of the scrapper:
  • fast (Default mode): extracts basic data of a contact (full name, title and profile url).
  • normal : tries to complete emails using basic data extracted.
The unit cost is per user added to your list.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account. A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and add the li_at cookie value.

processors.name: group-members
processors.extended_description:
Get members in a LinkedIn group. Extraction is limited to first 100 members. You can setup the list where you want to save them (default: my-list). The system automatically creates the list. The unit cost is per user added to your list.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account. A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and add the li_at cookie value.

processors.name: invitations
processors.extended_description:
Extract last 80 invitations sent from your LinkedIn. You can setup the list where you want to save them (default: last-invitations). The system automatically creates the list.

Extraction mode affects the speed of the scrapper:
  • fast (Default mode): extracts basic data of a contact (full name, title and profile url).
  • normal : tries to complete emails using basic data extracted.
The unit cost is per user added to your list.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account. A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and add the li_at cookie value.

processors.name: post-comments
processors.extended_description:
Get users who comment a post on LinkedIn. You can setup the list where you want to save them (default: my-list). The system automatically creates the list. The unit cost is per user added to your list.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account. A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and add the li_at cookie value.

processors.name: post-likes
processors.extended_description:
Get users who like a post on LinkedIn. You can setup the list where you want to save them (default: my-list). The system automatically creates the list. The unit cost is per user added to your list.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account. A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and add the li_at cookie value.

processors.name: profiles
processors.extended_description:
Extract results from a LinkedIn search (url format accepted: https://linkedin.com/search/results/people/). You can setup the amount (10 contacts by default) and the list where you want to save them (default: my-list). The system automatically creates the list.

Extraction mode affects the speed of the scrapper:
  • fast (Default mode. Up to 1000 contacts): extracts basic data of a contact (full name, title and profile url).
  • normal (Up to 1000 contacts): tries to complete emails using basic data extracted.
The unit cost is per user added to your list.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account. A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and add the li_at cookie value.

processors.name: profiles-by-company
processors.extended_description:
Extract employees of a LinkedIn company profile. You can setup the list where you want to save them (default: employees). The system automatically creates the list.

A fast extraction of first 100 employees is done. The unit cost is per employee added to your list.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account. A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and add the li_at cookie value.

processors.name: visit
processors.extended_description:
Visits a profile to show interest and get profile views in return from contact, increasing your LinkedIn network. We only visit profiles with /in/ in url.

Please, respect LinkedIn browsing limits to avoid problems with your account. A new LinkedIn application is required at Applications section and add the li_at cookie value.

processors.name: email-to-list
processors.extended_description: Add a contact email to a person list. You can setup the list where you want to save them (default: my-list). Contact research is done if contact doesn't exist to get basic data. Really useful if you want to forward new contact data to Zapier or Webhooks.

processors.extended_description: Get prospect's contact data and company's location and social data by email

processors.name: extended-by-email-and-company
processors.extended_description: Get contact, location and social data by email and company name and location. Company data allows to improve prospect resolution.

processors.name: faked-data
processors.extended_description: Generates random fake data. Useful for signups.

processors.name: by-employee-data
processors.description: LinkedIn URI by first, last and company
processors.description_en: LinkedIn URI by first, last and company
processors.extended_description:
Get LinkedIn employee profile URI by firstname, lastname and company without manual search on Google or LinkedIn.

This tool uses search engines (Bing and Google) through proxies. If you want to hire a dedicated proxy, contact with Killia.

properties.name: profile
properties.description: Contains LinkedIn profile uri of given data

properties.name: score
properties.description: Contains score confidence criteria of LinkedIn profile research. Higher is better

processors.cleaned_description: linkedin uri by first, last and company

processors.name: by-text
processors.extended_description: It allows to analyze an english text with Emojis and detect sentiment. Improve your customer care service automatically, analyzing emails, chats, ... It uses AFINN-165 english wordlist and Emojis sentiment ranking.

properties.name: score
properties.description: Contains sentiment detected by numeric score: -5 (very negative) to 5 (very positive)

properties.name: level
properties.description: Contains sentiment detected with a descriptive value: verynegative (<-2.5), negative (< -0.5), neutral, positive (>0.5), verypositive (>2.5)

processors.extended_description: Discover if a domain or a website has social activity and returns all social network profiles found

properties.description: Returns scoring about activity on all social networks

processors.extended_description: Discover if an mobile phone has social activity, and get all social network profiles found

processors.extended_description: This tools parses a social uri address and extracts any available indicators. Next social networks are supported: Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Google Plus, Instagram, Pinterest, Slideshare
